attributes.action: Why Nigerian Politicians are not paid with certificate as in civil sevant?
attributes.additional_details:
if This is solved Nigeria youth and youth to come will create harmonious living.
There will be social economic development 
There will peaceful coexistence.
There will be peace in the world because crisis in a place can affect others in an unexpected ways.
attributes.background: I want Political office holder in Nigeria to earn there salary in respect to there certificate as civil servant received there. With this Nation can avoid waste of resources and cater for employment, infrastructure , Health , Education

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the Government of Nigeria.
